general.name: Tribis Alexandr
general.companyKol: Orsha College of Vitebsk State University named after P.M. Masherov

about.text: Goal-oriented Frontend Developer with commercial experience in React and TypeScript development. Have a strong technical background confirmed by completed courses from The Rolling Scopes School. Possess more than 6 years of experience in teaching IT disciplines, which developed mentoring skills, explaining complex concepts and teamwork. Looking for an interesting project with modern technology stack where I can contribute and grow professionally.

slana.name: Slana - FinTech Platform for Monetech (Mexico) - international FinTech company
slana.description: Development of frontend part for financial operations automation and payment management platform
responsibilities: Development of user interfaces for financial operations management
Implementation of real-time transaction monitoring module
Creation of analytics and reporting components
Integration with backend API for financial data processing
Performance optimization of interfaces for large data volumes
Implementation of complex financial operations validation forms
Development of notification and alert system

cryptopro.name: CryptoPRO - Electronic Signature Management Platform
cryptopro.description: Development of frontend part for electronic signature management system and cryptographic operations
responsibilities: Development of user interfaces for electronic signature and certificate management
Integration with OIDC client for secure authentication
Implementation of complex forms with validation using React Hook Form
Creation of components for cryptographic key management
Development of administrative interface using Ant Design
Setting up e2e testing with Cypress
Integration with backend services for cryptographic operations processing
achievements: Implemented secure authentication system with OIDC
Integrated modern code style and linting tools

internal.name: Internal Clevertec Projects
internal.description: Development and maintenance of corporate systems and tools
responsibilities: Development of UI components for internal component library
Refactoring legacy code and migration to modern stack
Participation in code review and mentoring junior developers
Optimization of development processes and CI/CD

teacher.position: Special Disciplines Teacher in Software Engineering
description: Conducting training sessions on professional components of the 'Software Engineering' specialty
achievements: Prepared a student who won 3rd place in the national WorldSkills Belarus 2020 competition in 'Web Design and Development'
